Half-Life 2 kupiłem z okazji tegorocznej letniej wyprzedaży.I powiem tak. Ta gra to mistrzostwo i tytuł gry roku 2004 jest jak najbardziej zasłużony,ale przejdę do plusów:
-Prosta ale przyjemna fabuła
-ładna grafika mimo że gra ma już 17 lat
-róznorodne poziomy
-ciekawe postacie 
-korzystanie z każdej broni daje wielką frajdę
-róznorodni przeciwnicy
-poruszanie się łodzią i autem także jest bardzo przyjemne
-świetny soundtrack
-dobry angielski dubbing
-władza nad antlionami urozmaica rozgrywkę
Teraz czas na minusy:
-mało G-Mana
-szkoda że Gordon Freeman przez całą grę jest niemową
Jeśli ktoś nie miał okazji zagrać w Half-Life 2 to polecam wydać 7zł bo daje mnóstwo frajdy i bez wątpienia jest jedną z najlepszych gier jakie kiedykolwiek powstały.
9,5 na 10

just amazing that's all I have to say

Half-Life 2 is without a doubt one of the greatest games of all time. The way it has accomplished in creating an atmospheric and believable world even in the genre of science fiction along with integrating impressive physics into the gameplay and graphical fidelity, that still looks more than decent today, makes it without a doubt a game that needs to be experience by every single gamer out there. Another awesome aspect about the game is how it narrates it's story through its environments and through subtlety which makes its lore all the more fascinating. It has a near impeccable gameplay variety which doesn't affect it's pacing at all and only compliments and improves it. You start without weapons to eventually being chased down sewage canals to getting an airboat to travel through toxic waste to a survival horror level set in a zombie-infested town to a dilapitated highway while riding in a buggy to playing the game's version of the floor is lava to breaching a prison before finally leading a rebellion back at the main city. Even after nearly a decade and a half, the game still holds up and is way better than most AAA games out there. A definite recommend! Also it's being sold on Steam at dirt cheap rates which is also appreciated.
Loved every second of Half Life 2 and it's extras (EP1 & EP2) It's an amazing game and a true classic. Definitely buy it and play it especially if you haven't already experienced the game before.
